price: এতেকে আজি মুমিনসকলে উপহাস কৰিব কাফিৰসকলক।
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
